description.value: The prehensile vines woven into your body grant you unmatched skill at climbing. You do not need to have any hands free to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Climb]{Climb}. Additionally, if you roll a success on an Athletics check to climb, you get a critical success instead.

rules.text: When you roll a success to Climb, you get a critical success instead.
rules.title: {item|name}
